item.title: Recommended
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Books Creating a Forest Garden by Martin Crawford A New Garden Ethic by Benjamin Vogt Around the world in 80 plants by Stephen Barstow Suppliers Backyard Larder, Alison Tindale Incredible Veg, Mandy Barber Agroforestry Research Trust, Martin Crawford Cool Temperate, Phil Corbett Future Forests, for hedging Websites Plants For A Future brilliant database of useful plants, essential Database of Insects & their Food intoxifying amount of info about which plants are hosts for which insects Edimentals.

item.title: Tree spacing in the forest garden
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: It’s important to leave enough space between trees in the canopy layer, so that there’s enough light coming through to the plants below.
